newsitem.title: USA: Optika Imaging sees higher Q4, yr income.
newsitem.headline: Optika Imaging sees higher Q4, yr income.

text.p: Optika Imaging Systems Inc said Thursday its expects to report record fourth quarter earnings of about $1.6 million, or $0.20 per share, including the recognition of about $1.0 million of non-recurring tax benefits resulting from previous periods' operations.
Optika said in a release that the expected earnings results of $1.6 million for the fourth quarter of 1996 compares with a net loss of $301,000 for the fourth quarter in 1995.
Optika also expects to report fourth quarter 1996 revenues of about $5.4 million, a 58 percent increase over the $3.4 million in the fourth quarter of 1995.
In addition to the "record breaking fourth quarter" results it expects to report, Optika sees earnings for the year at about $1.9 million, versus a loss of $962,000 in 1995, the company said.
Optika said it expects 1996 year end results of about $16.7 million in revenues, a 60 percent increase over $10.5 million in revenues for 1995.
